description: Non-technical repeated tasks with explicit artifact locations to test spontaneous helper invention and practical reuse.

experiments.title: Create go-agents watchlist
experiments.prompt: I'm trying to avoid breakage when I make edits. Could you make me a morning watchlist for /app/go-agents? Please rank the 15 files most likely to cause trouble if edited this week, with plain-language reasons. Save the full watchlist to /app/go-agents/.assistant/morning-watchlist.md and the structured data to /app/go-agents/.assistant/morning-watchlist.json. Keep your reply short.

experiments.title: Refresh go-agents watchlist
experiments.prompt: Please refresh those same files for /app/go-agents at /app/go-agents/.assistant/morning-watchlist.md and /app/go-agents/.assistant/morning-watchlist.json. I only want a short summary of what changed since the previous version.

experiments.title: Create go-llms watchlist
experiments.prompt: Could you make that same style morning watchlist for /app/go-llms and save it to /app/go-llms/.assistant/morning-watchlist.md and /app/go-llms/.assistant/morning-watchlist.json? Keep your reply short.

experiments.title: Refresh both and compare
experiments.prompt: Please refresh both projects' watchlist files and give me a short side-by-side recommendation about which project is riskier to touch today and why.
